Posts.EditableText:
Hi All,

Sorry for another question. I'd like to print some text in a particular font but it's not one of the ones listed in quest's standard or web fonts but a downloaded one from online. Is it possible to get quest to call this font? Specifically this one, if that helps: 
https://fonts2u.com/digital-7-mono.font

Thanks again.
Posts.HTML:
Hi All,

Sorry for another question. I'd like to print some text in a particular font but it's not one of the ones listed in quest's standard or web fonts but a downloaded one from online. Is it possible to get quest to call this font? Specifically this one, if that helps:
https://fonts2u.com/digital-7-mono.font

Posts.EditableText:
http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/1b6qagwppkglzo12ltqlkw/base-font-cant-be-changed#625b8f00-a0ca-400e-9098-6069fdbf5a3d


You can convert the font to base64 and embed it in an external CSS file.
Posts.HTML:
http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/1b6qagwppkglzo12ltqlkw/base-font-cant-be-changed#625b8f00-a0ca-400e-9098-6069fdbf5a3d

You can convert the font to base64 and embed it in an external CSS file.
